# CMake project autogenerated by GENie
cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 2.8.4)

project(bimg)
set(
source_list
  ../../../bimg/include/bimg/bimg.h
  ../../../bimg/include/bimg/decode.h
  ../../../bimg/include/bimg/encode.h
  ../../../bimg/src/image.cpp
  ../../../bimg/src/image_gnf.cpp
)

add_definitions(-D__STDC_LIMIT_MACROS)
add_definitions(-D__STDC_FORMAT_MACROS)
add_definitions(-D__STDC_CONSTANT_MACROS)

add_library(bimg STATIC ${source_list})
target_link_libraries(bimg PRIVATE bx)
target_include_directories(bimg PUBLIC ../../../bimg/include)
